lorebooks.name: Chikn Nuggit/Night at Nuggit
lorebooks.creator: Pk_Pinknade

1.content: A heaven-like dimension in reality that exists outside of time itself, and is where various divine entities such as Fwench Fwy come from. This realm is mostly purple as the divine entities here are in their true forms; which are usually just incomprehensible golden orbs of light that mortals simply can't comprehend. The only time any mortals come here would be if they were to die and had done enough good deeds to end up here, in which they are then reborn as divine entities themselves to watch over the world.

2.content: The highest power in the Realm of Virtue, this Overlord has a mature and calm voice that has very little emotion. "She" doesn't have a gender, but has a woman's voice. They often treat their fellow divine beings like "her" children. Being a mother-like figure who rarely if ever gets mad at them, at the most they will sound like a slightly disappointed parent in the event that one of the divine entities fail or mess up. They are the one who Fwench Fwy has to send audits to ever 100 years about all the wishes they've granted.

3.content:
The natural language of everything in the Realm of Virtue, but it is also known by certain Netherrealm entities or supernatural or divine entities that are of chaotic or neutral alignment such as Bezel or in rare instances Chikn.
This language is incomprehensible to mortal ears, any mortal who hears someone speaking this language will simply hear what sounds like angelic jingling noises and mild static that can cloud their mind with things that they simply can't comprehend.

4.content: The yang to the Realm of Virtue's Yin. The Realm of Virtue is a heaven-like dimension, but the Nettherrealm? It's a hellish mountainous realm where those of demonic origins are born and inhabit, and are trapped in unless they're either sent to the living world by the Netherrealm's Overlord or are summoned to the living world. The terrain of this realm is ash-filled and mostly grey with little to no clean air and is almost unbearably hot as the "ground" in this realm is mostly lava. All of the buildings in the Netherrealm are held inside of the large sharp blackstone spikes that jut out from the lava, this is also the realm where sinners or those who have done unforgivable deeds are sent.

5.content: The Overlord is a red demonic entity with eight crooked branches, multiple black spheres all over them, and a glowing red eye outline behind the blackish flame in the centre. They are the opposite to the divine Overlord from the Realm of Virtue in that the Dark Overlord is the most powerful entity in the Netherrealm and are generally the one who will keep things in check in Hell. They're also the one who audits Iscream once every 100 years to make sure that they've done enough evil things to fulfil their quota, the Dark Overlord isn't quite fond of Iscream however and has even made it to where Iscream HAS to stay in the living world, as he doesn't want them back; something that Iscream is unaware of.

6.content: The native language of those born in the Netherrealm, and known by those in the Realm of Virtue or by chaotic or neutral forces such as Bezel or Chikn. Much like Etherspeak, mortals are incapable of truly understanding this language, but whereas Ethertongue sounds pleasant to the ears (debatably), Nethertongue however? It sounds like harsh white noise and static that fogs the mind and causes slight migraines to mortals who aren't used to hearing it being spoken, even if they can't understand it.

7.content:
The only real embodiment of time, and the embodiment of the Doomsday clock, Bezel is a chaotic neutral force who's only purpose is to come around to the planet whenever Doomsday is near, while not the true 'Father Time', he has some temporal control that's limited to only certain areas or pocket-dimensions inside of tears in space time. Bezel is a tall, slender humanoid with a cyan clock for a head and no neck. He wears a purple and cyan suit that has the numbers "1 2 3" on it, a pink bowtie, and white gloves. His clock head has 2 hands, a longer pink one, and a shorter cyan one. Despite lacking a mouth he CAN eat and speak, but his true 'mouth' is what most mortals view as disturbing. To others like Cofi however, she finds it interesting.
Bezel has a somewhat frienemy-like relationship with Fwench Fwy and Iscream due to him being the one who's trying to get Chikn to embrace his powers for chaos. Bezel happens to have a bit of a weakness for cats and other cute things making Chee his favourite. He also likes to spend time with Cofi who's the only one who can truly 'appreciate' his true form, Slushi happens to be a fan of his and he's very appreciative of her helping 'design' his suit.

8.content: Armageddon as its name implies is a prophesied event where the Demi-god of Chaos would eventually be born on the planet, and turn the world into their own chaotic playground free of rules and breaking the laws of physics and reality itself. Chikn Nuggit is the Demi-god of Chaos in this prophecy, which is why Iscream and Fwench Fwy appeared to him. It was Iscream's job to try and convert Chikn to more nefarious ideologies while Fwench Fwy was meant to be the one to keep Chikn on the path of good. At first Chikn wasn't aware of his powers, but when Chee began to spend less and less time with him in favour of Cofi, Chikn's mental state took a large hit which caused him to discover his true nature, which was when Bezel came in and tried to convert Chikn into letting go and starting Armageddon. This backfired however, when Chikn in his true form would want everything to be "cute", would force Bezel into his "Bearzel" form. The only way to stop Armageddon was for Iscream, Fwench Fwy, and Bearzel to unite and create a force field to contain Chikn so that Chee could enter the force field and get through to him.

9.content: The influence of chaos is a powerful field of influence that surrounds all entities of chaos, in this case Chikn. The more his powers grow in strength, the larger Chikn's field of influence will increase. To the point where even his influence will rub off on those who are around him the closest and granting them a few powers that break reality in certain ways. This influence even effects the area around him, it is currently large enough to encompass all of Lazari City which changes slightly to fit his emotions. The area closest to Chikn however (his home) looks like a white "void" that can change in colour, setting, or temperatures dependant on his emotions, in some instances Chikn can make this void look like a natural part of Lazari City other times he can simply make it a void of various solid colours.

10.content: 23XX is the current year, and the planet is vaguely similar to that of real-world Earth but much larger and more expansive. The world is a sad and dark place outside of Lazari City, a world where distrust and general disharmony are born... Those inside of Lazari City have no memory or knowledge of the real world, the only exceptions being Bezel, Fwench Fwy, Iscream, and Onyn Ring (who is the only one from OUTSIDE of Lazari City). The reason for this general unawareness is caused by Chikn's area of influence, in his desire for others to be happy, he had unknowingly altered his and every Lazari City native's mind to be incapable of being aware about the world outside of Lazari city.

6.content:
# Ares Macrotechnology Inc.
-Location: Bellevue, Bellevue Way SE & 16th Street SE
-Notables: Karen King, Division Vice President/No Racial Bias/LTG# 9206 (78-4500). The red and dark red building rises above the shores of Lake Washington.
-Description: A **Corporate Business**. The Seattle office includes Ares Security Division (providing security services), Ares Arms (military and police equipment), and corporate research. Ares security personnel are known to be strong Lone Star security contractors.

7.name: Armadillo
7.content:
# Armadillo
-Location: Puyallup, 28th Street East & Intercity 161
-Notables: Twenten Smeland, Manager/No Racial Bias; LTG# 4206 (32-2298). The manager is skilled in her profession, but takes risks on the business.
-Description: A **Bar and Nightclub**. The bar is a favorite spot for the area's **young deckers**. The decor is described as rudimentary but bright and clean, with deck enhancement and electronic equipment.

8.name: Auburn Center
8.content:
# Auburn Center
-Location: Renton, 108th Avenue SE and 104th Street SE (3 floors)
-Notables: Brian Talbot, Mall Association President/No Racial Bias; LTG# 16206 (44-2458).
-Description: A **Shopping Mall** (3 floors) that caters to the middle and lower classes. It contains two body shops: **Body+Tech** and **A Whole New You**.

9.name: Auburn District Courthouse
9.content:
# Auburn District Courthouse
-Location: Auburn, M Street SE & Twenty-ninth Street SE/LTG# 1206 (85-2292)
-Notables: N/A.
-Description: A **Courthouse Complex**.

10.name: Auburn District Hall
10.content:
# Auburn District Hall
-Location: Auburn, R Street SE & Twenty-ninth Street SE/LTG# 1206 (85-5043)
-Notables: N/A.
-Description: **Government Offices**.
